name: A blue field plate
data: It increases the users strength adequately.
It increases the users dexterity pathetically.
It decreases the users wisdom poorly.
It decreases the users intelligence poorly.
It has superb armour class for its type (superb in general).
It decreases the users spellpoint regeneration pitifully.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'inner strength'.
